com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.material

Class TextureHsvMaterial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.material.Material
      • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.material.TextureMaterial
        • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.material.TransparentTextureMaterial
          • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.material.TextureHsvMaterial

  • public class TextureHsvMaterial
extends TransparentTextureMaterial
    This material has texture and HSV color.
    The hue of the texture can be changed. Saturation and brightness can be reduced. And opacity can also be adjusted.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

      • TextureHsvMaterial

        public TextureHsvMaterial(TextureRegion textureRegion,
                  float hOffset,
                  float sMulti,
                  float vMulti)
        Creates a TextureHsvMaterial.
        Parameters:
        textureRegion - TextureRegion.
        hOffset - Hue offset (value between 0.0f and 360.0f).
        sMulti - Saturation multiplier (value between 0.0f and 1.0f).
        vMulti - Brightness multiplier (value between 0.0f and 1.0f).

      • TextureHsvMaterial

        public TextureHsvMaterial(TextureRegion textureRegion,
                  float opacity,
                  float hOffset,
                  float sMulti,
                  float vMulti)
        Creates a TextureHsvMaterial.
        Parameters:
        textureRegion - TextureRegion.
        opacity - (value between 0.0f and 1.0f).
        hOffset - Hue offset (value between 0.0f and 360.0f).
        sMulti - Saturation multiplier (value between 0.0f and 1.0f).
        vMulti - Brightness multiplier (value between 0.0f and 1.0f).
